easyStandard.skull: -X. X is the total amount of doom and breaches on your location.
easyStandard.cultist: Reveal another token. If there are fewer than 3 breaches on your location, place 1 breach on your location.
easyStandard.tablet: -2. For each point you fail by, remove 1 breach from the current act.
easyStandard.elderSign: -3. If you fail, place 1 breach on a random location.

hardExpert.skull: -X. X is 1 higher than the total amount of doom and breaches on your location.
hardExpert.cultist: Reveal another token. If there are fewer than 3 breaches on your location, place 1 breach on your location.
hardExpert.tablet: -3. For each point you fail by, remove 1 breach from the current act.
hardExpert.elderSign: -4. If you fail, place 1 breach on a random location.
